amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend through 2010 certain tax incentives for renewable energy production and energy efficient building construction.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2653 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2653 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S13118-13119, S13136, S13128; text: CR S13119; text as modified: CR S13126) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend through 2010 certain tax incentives for renewable energy production and energy efficient building construction.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2653 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2653 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Reid.
